code: import React from'react';import'./Card.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Card=_ref=>{let{title,description,imageUrl}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imageUrl,alt:title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"card-title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-description",children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Explore"})]})]});};export default Card;
